subject: [PATCH v4 0/3] btrfs: fix COW amplification under memory pressure

reviews.author: Filipe Manana
reviews.summary: Provided a Reviewed-by tag, indicating they have reviewed the code and found it acceptable for inclusion in the kernel.

2026-02-26.patch_summary: This patch adds a new tracepoint to the Btrfs file system, specifically for tracking search slot restarts during btrfs_search_slot() operations. The tracepoint records the root, tree level, and reason for each restart, enabling more detailed analysis of COW amplification under memory pressure.
